body.p:
Cynthiana Ky July 11, 1861,
Beriah Magoffin
Sir

At an election held by the "McDowell Guards" of the 2nd Battallion of the 1st Regiment of the Kentucky State guard, about the 1st of May last, the undersigned was elected 1st Lieut of said company. I have as yet received no commission from your excellency, and with your permission I hereby resign all claims to the issueing of a commission to me, by virtue of said election.
I reccommend that the above resignation be accepted.

R. M. Kelly
Capt McDowell S
McDowell Guards
J M Givens
1st Lt
July 19 1861
